title: Real Estate Video editor - Very Experienced
job_overview:
Real Estate Video Editor (Modern Style +Motion Graphics)
We’re a fast-growing real estate media company looking for a skilled and reliable video editor to join our team. We shoot beautiful cinematic walkthroughs of homes, and we need an editor who can turn raw footage into high-impact listing videos—and create short, engaging social media edits from the same footage. Familiarity with modern real estate video styles like what you see Upgrade to see actual info on Instagram.


What You’ll Be Editing:
Main videos (landscape, cinematic walkthroughs, 60–120 seconds)


Vertical social media edits (Reels, TikToks) pulled from main footage


Some voiceover syncing


Speed ramping, motion blur, modern transitions, and day-to-night matching


Agent text overlays and trendy text animations behind subjects


Occasional single-shot “speed tour” edits for social media (no talking)


Our Workflow:
You’ll receive footage and basic notes via Google Drive


Editors use their own system (Premiere Pro or Final Cut both OK)


We expect 48-hour turnaround for first drafts


Revisions due within 4 hours of notes


Work is consistent: 3–5 projects/week, with room to grow into additional editing work (like social media/talking heads/course content)


Requirements:
Experience editing real estate listings (Please provide samples)


Strong understanding of pacing, property flow, and visual storytelling


Ability to match edits to voiceover, create clean transitions, and build a cohesive timeline


Skill with music selection, especially trending or cinematic tracks for social content


Familiarity with modern styles like what you see Upgrade to see actual info on Instagram


Compensation:
Open to either flat rate per video or hourly ($8/hr)


Long-term opportunity for the right editor


To Apply:
Please send:
Your best real estate video samples
